Special Powers
I PRAY YOU WAIT JUST A MOMENT: Armored Pogg Ur-Pogg can't be chosen for Mastermind. // After the resolution of any action, if no friendly character named Pogg Ur-Pogg is on the map, KO Armored Pogg Ur-Pogg. // When Armored Pogg Ur-Pogg would take damage, you may instead roll a d6.
*1-3: Deal Pogg Ur-Pogg 1 unavoidable damage.
*4-6: Deal Pogg Ur-Pogg 2 unavoidable damage. Protected: Pulse Wave.
